question: Which of the following is true regarding route tables?

answers.A: AWS allows a hard limit of 300 route tables per VPC with 50 routes per table
answers.B: The target of a route can only be a CIDR block
answers.C: Your VPC automatically comes with a main route table that you can modify
answers.D: You cannot delete the main route table, but you can replace the main route table with a custom table that you've created
